DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the best evaluation for patients with idiopathic (unexplained) pancreatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of Idiopathic Pancreatitis: Role of Endoscopic Ultrasonography
DOC.detailed_description: The study evaluates the role of endoscopic ultrasonography, given that the minimally invasive procedures can diagnosis gallbladder disease as well as pancreatitis abnormalities.
DOC.criteria: All patients referred to the principal investigator for unexplained pancreatitis will be enrolled. There are no gender nor racial exclusion.
